text: @realDonaldTrump Don't EVER say we are the "greatest country on earth" when a person can't get into a hospital for #COVID19. He died. Blood on your hands in not preparing this country. You golfed. You rallied. You failed. @GOP @PressSec https://t.co/MKirAGeS3P
